arts.ttl: Lazio vs. Verona to close out Matchday 2
arts.sum: Verona approaches this match on the back of five positive results in all competitions, among last season and this season: 1 win and 4 draws (all 1-1). Maurizio Sarri coached Verona in Lega Pro I Divisione from January to February 2008, with five matches resulting in 1 win and 4 defeats.
